columns.name: name
columns.description: The name of the resource.

columns.name: id
columns.description: Fully qualified resource ID for the resource.

columns.name: provisioning_state
columns.description: Provisioning state of the resource. Possible values include: 'Unknown', 'Succeeded', 'Failed', 'Canceled', 'Running', 'Creating', 'Updating', 'Deleting', 'Moving'.

columns.name: type
columns.description: The type of the resource.

columns.name: external_ip
columns.description: The publicly accessible IP of the SignalR service.

columns.name: host_name
columns.description: FQDN of the SignalR service instance.

columns.name: host_name_prefix
columns.description: Prefix for the host name of the SignalR service.

columns.name: kind
columns.description: The kind of the service. Possible values include: 'SignalR', 'RawWebSockets'.

columns.name: public_port
columns.description: The publicly accessible port of the SignalR service which is designed for browser/client side usage.

columns.name: server_port
columns.description: The publicly accessible port of the SignalR service which is designed for customer server side usage.

columns.name: version
columns.description: Version of the SignalR resource.

columns.name: cors
columns.description: Cross-Origin Resource Sharing (CORS) settings of the resource.

columns.name: diagnostic_settings
columns.description: A list of active diagnostic settings for the SignalR service.

columns.name: features
columns.description: List of SignalR feature flags.

columns.name: network_acls
columns.description: Network ACLs of the resource.

columns.name: private_endpoint_connections
columns.description: Private endpoint connections to the SignalR resource.

columns.name: sku
columns.description: The billing information of the resource.

columns.name: upstream
columns.description: Upstream settings when the Azure SignalR is in server-less mode.

columns.name: title
columns.description: ColumnDescriptionTitle

columns.name: tags
columns.description: ColumnDescriptionTags

columns.name: region
columns.description: ColumnDescriptionRegion

columns.name: resource_group
columns.description: ColumnDescriptionResourceGroup
